ComicInfo.Title: The Nightstalker, Part 3 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
An overnight stakeout proves futile as yet another dismembered body is found at a local church. But all is not lost as lead detective Mike Higgins finds an intriguing connection in all of the “Nighstalker” victims and decides to pay a long awaited visit to an old friend. Meanwhile, journalist Ted Banks has a disturbing nightmare that seems much too real as he awakes to find his own life may be in serious danger.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-29 15:55:33. [CVDB140430]
